mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ESB_TRIGGER ( TRIG_ID, TRIG_TYPE, TRIG_DT, TRIG_STATUS, MEMB_ID, SVR_ID, DEVICE_CTN, REG_ID, REG_DT, UPD_ID, UPD_DT ) VALUES ( #{trigID}, #{trigType}, #{trigDt, jdbcType=DATE}, #{trigStatus}, #{membID}, #{svrID}, #{deviceCTN}, #{regID}, SYSDATE, #{updID}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT TRIG_ID, TRIG_TYPE, TRIG_DT, TRIG_STATUS, MEMB_ID, SVR_ID, DEVICE_CTN FROM ( SELECT /*+index(TB_ESB_TRIGGER IDX_ESB_TRIGGER_01)*/ TRIG_ID, TRIG_TYPE, TRIG_DT, TRIG_STATUS, MEMB_ID, SVR_ID, DEVICE_CTN FROM TB_ESB_TRIGGER WHERE TRIG_DT < #{trigDt} AND SVR_ID = #{svrID} AND TRIG_STATUS = #{trigStatus} ORDER BY TRIG_DT ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM < #{rownum}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_ESB_TRIGGER SET TRIG_STATUS = #{trigStatus}, RESULT_CODE = #{resultCode}, UPD_ID = #{updID}, UPD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE TRIG_ID = #{trigID}
mapper.select: SELECT DEVICE_MODEL_ID FROM TB_CONN_DEVICE WHERE MEMB_ID = #{membId}
